participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and sociable, enjoys meeting new people and making connections.
participant_1.background: I have four siblings. My youngest sister is in first grade. I am 5'3" and am the shortest person in my family. My father is a school teacher, he teaches middle school. I am the oldest sibling.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and caring, has a passion for teaching and enjoys spending time with children.
participant_2.background: I just moved into an apartment within the vicinity of my new job. I am twenty-two years old. I just graduated college with my bachelor’s degree in education. I love children. I just accepted a job at the elementary school in my hometown.

content.text: Hi I'm Alex. I just moved to this town and I'm looking for new friends.
Hi Alex! I'm Sarah. I'm new here too. I just graduated from college and I got a job at the elementary school in town.
That's awesome! What grade do you teach?
I'm a first grade teacher!
Oh that's so cool! My youngest sister is in first grade.
That's great! I love working with first graders. They're so cute and innocent.
Yeah they are. My sister is a little ball of energy.
I bet she is! I love when they're that age. They're just starting to learn so much about the world and they're always so excited about everything.
Yeah it's really cute. I'm glad you're a teacher. I think you'll be great at it.
Thanks Alex! I'm really excited to get started.
Well I'm glad you're here. It's nice to meet you Sarah.
It's nice to meet you too Alex.
So what do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, go to the movies, and hang out with friends.
That sounds like fun. I like to do all of those things too.
Great! Maybe we can hang out sometime.
That would be great! I'm free on Saturday.
That works for me! We can go to the movies or something.
Sounds good. Let's see what's playing.
Okay. I'll text you my number
